title: Thailand Households Debt To GDP
description: Households Debt in Thailand decreased to 90.10 percent of GDP in the first quarter of 2022 from 91 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 2021. Households Debt to GDP in Thailand averaged 52.87 percent of GDP from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 91 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 2021 and a record low of 25.40 percent of GDP in the fourth quarter of 1991. This page provides - Thailand Households Debt To Gdp- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank for International Settlements
